about.title: Let's get acquainted
about.caption: I know how you feel when:
text: Hi, I'm Yulia and my motto in life is to live a high life! I am always doing something that brings me pleasure, I love to discover new cities, countries, continents and I never stop doing it. For over 7 years I've been helping start-up companies develop and optimize their business.

My goal is to make this world a little better and increase the number of conscious happy people. That's why in 2021 I decided to dedicate myself to coaching and use all my experience to help those who are lost, do not see any prospects or do not know where to start.
Together we'll unlock your potential, take apart your desires and identify what's holding you back on the path to your goals. And you'll definitely find out what it's like to live high!
items: Everyone around seems to be more successful and happier
Forced to do things I don't like

withCoach.title: Why it's better with a coach
text: 'Myself' is a common mistake of people who push themselves and constantly face burnout...
Of course, you can do it yourself if you find the time and strength to study all the necessary information, understand what you need, what the problems are, and begin to act.
But time is short, and your current knowledge has led to your current situation.

Why 'reinvent the wheel', spend time, money and effort to go all the way on your own and not necessarily successfully? When you can ask for professional help and get a result faster and easier. That's what all successful people do!
